com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities

Class ContactUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities.ContactUtilities

  • public class ContactUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    NOTE! This requires the permission: to be declared in the Manifest to work properly This class is for interacting with the contact database in the user's phone. Note, it is NOT for adding new contacts, but only for querying and obtaining results Created by pmacdowell on 8/15/2016.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ContactUtilities.Builder 
      static class  ContactUtilities.Contact
      Contact entity object
      static class  ContactUtilities.SearchQueryFlags
      These filters add options for query results 1)ADD_ALPHABET_HEADERS - Adds alphabetically ordered headers to the top to match the First name of the contact (raw display name).
      static class  ContactUtilities.SearchTypes
      The type of search options that can be performed.

    • Field Detail

      • BLOCK_LIST_NUMBERS

        public static final java.lang.String[] BLOCK_LIST_NUMBERS
        List of service numbers. These can be blocked for bringing up a list to send SMS to as they will not take in SMS

    • Method Detail

      • getAllContacts

        public void getAllContacts()
        Query to get all of the contacts. NOTE! This call is slower than the other, more specific calls as this one does nested database queries. If you want a faster approach, use queryContacts(SearchTypes[], Integer) or any other variations on the queryContacts(vars) methods.

      • getAllContacts

        public void getAllContacts(java.lang.String query)
        Query to get all of the contacts. NOTE! This call is slower than the other, more specific calls as this one does nested database queries. If you want a faster approach, use queryContacts(SearchTypes[], Integer) or any other variations on the queryContacts(vars) methods.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to search for (will ping off of name initially)

      • getAllContacts

        public void getAllContacts(@Nullable
                           java.util.regex.Pattern regularExpressionFilter)
        Query to get all of the contacts. NOTE! This call is slower than the other, more specific calls as this one does nested database queries. If you want a faster approach, use queryContacts(SearchTypes[], Integer) or any other variations on the queryContacts(vars) methods.
        Parameters:
        regularExpressionFilter - Regular Expression to filter for

      • queryContacts

        public void queryContacts(@Nullable
                          ContactUtilities.SearchTypes[] typesToQuery,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.Integer maxNumResults)
        Perform a contact query on an asynchronous background thread. Data is passed back on the OnTaskCompleteListener. This is overloaded to allow no query string to be passed in. Treats it as if an empty string was passed.
        Parameters:
        typesToQuery - Array of SearchTypes enum objects. These are the types of items to actually make a query to. Sending multiple will return multiple See ContactUtilities.SearchTypes
        maxNumResults - The int max number of results per search type. If null or zero is passed, it will simply have no limit on the max number of results.

      • queryContacts

        public void queryContacts(@Nullable
                          ContactUtilities.SearchTypes[] typesToQuery,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.Integer maxNumResults,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.String query)
        Perform a contact query on an asynchronous background thread. Data is passed back on the OnTaskCompleteListener
        Parameters:
        typesToQuery - Array of SearchTypes enum objects. These are the types of items to actually make a query to. Sending multiple will return multiple See ContactUtilities.SearchTypes. If null is passed, it will query all 4 types.
        maxNumResults - The int max number of results per search type. If null or zero is passed, it will simply have no limit on the max number of results.
        query - The query to be included (in String format)

      • queryContacts

        public void queryContacts(@Nullable
                          ContactUtilities.SearchTypes[] typesToQuery,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.Integer maxNumResults,
                          @Nullable
                          java.util.regex.Pattern regularExpressionFilter)

        public static java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> getAllDataQuery(android.content.Context context,

                                                                       int maxNumResults,
                                                                       boolean removeBlockListItems,

      • getAllDataQuery

        public static java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> getAllDataQuery(@Nullable
                                                                       OnTaskCompleteListener progressListener,
                                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                                       java.lang.String query,
                                                                       int maxNumResults,
                                                                       boolean removeBlockListItems,
                                                                       boolean onlyKeepContactsWithPhotos)
        Query that will pull all data. NOTE! This is a much slower call as it is doing multiple nested queries
        Parameters:
        progressListener - Listener to send progress back upon. If null, no progress to be sent back
        context - Context used to obtain the contentResolver
        query - Query to be searched
        maxNumResults - max number of results to return. if 0, no limit
        removeBlockListItems - remove contacts that are on the BLOCK_LIST_NUMBERS list
        onlyKeepContactsWithPhotos - Only return those contacts with photos.
        Returns:
        A List of ContactUtilities.Contact

      • checkAndSetSelected

        public static java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> checkAndSetSelected(java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> listOfContacts,
                                                                           java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> selectedContacts,
                                                                           @NonNull
                                                                           ContactUtilities.SearchTypes typeSearchingThrough)
        Iterates through the list of all contacts and compares to the list of selected contacts to see if they are on the list. If they are, it sets the full listOfContacts individual object to selected=true and then returns it. This is used for when a new search / query is made and you get back a full list of contacts, but don't know which ones are selected so that a recyclerview 'isSelected' won't work.
        Parameters:
        listOfContacts - The list of contacts that is unknown as to whether or not it is selected. This would be the list brought back from query
        selectedContacts - This is the persisted list of contacts where the user has already selected some and they are persisted.
        typeSearchingThrough - This is the type we are searching through. (To obtain the correct String info to compare against)
        Returns:
        List ContactUtilities.Contact

      • deselectAllContacts

        public static java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> deselectAllContacts(java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> listOfContacts)
        Deselect all contacts in a list
        Parameters:
        listOfContacts - List to set and return
        Returns:
        Altered list of the one passed in

      • selectAllContacts

        public static java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> selectAllContacts(java.util.List<ContactUtilities.Contact> listOfContacts)
        Select all contacts in a list
        Parameters:
        listOfContacts - List to set and return
        Returns:
        Altered list of the one passed in

      • numberOnBlockList

        public static boolean numberOnBlockList(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Checks if the number is one of the ones we want to remove from list. This list includes the build in ones into the phone (IE, #data, *611, etc)
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Phone number to check against
        Returns:
        boolean, true if it is on the list, false if it is not
